19.note: Large campsite, close to the toilets, not much privacy. No extra space.

20.note: Sloping drive, not much shelter from the wind.

21.note: Shares drive with site 22, some shelter from the wind.

22.note: Shares drive with site 21, small tree, small extra space, sheltered from the wind and privacy from the road.

23.note: Big tree, nice shade. Lots of extra space, long drive and private.

24.note: Close to the road, small tree, sloping drive

25.note: Sheltered from the wind, no car park, near to water tap.

26.note: Shared road access with 27. Have to park car across the road, near to water tap.

27.note: Shared road access with 26. Have to park car across the road, near to water tap.

28.note: No extra space, but sheltered from the wind and a big site. Near to the toilet.

29.note: Close to the toilet, no extra space, quite sheltered from the wind.

30.note: Close to the road, sheltered from the wind, big site, no extra space.

31.note: Close to the road, sheltered from the wind, no extra space, nice path to the beach.

32.note: Next to the day use area, extra space, but this is shared with the day use parking spot.

33.note: Some shelter from the wind, no extra space

34.note: Extra space, with a long drive, near water tap, smallish site.

35.note: Good site, with long drive and extra space, near to the toilet. Does get a big puddle at the bottom of the drive in heavy rain.

37.note: Nice trees, car park 10m from site

38.note: Long drive with extra space and nice trees, large site with a lovely path to the beach.

39.note: Shared drive with site 40, nice tree with small extra space

40.note: Shared drive with site 39, small extra space

41.note: This is a nice site with extra space and a good tree.

42.note: Small extra space, right across from the toilet.

43.note: Path to the beach is next to 44, 45, doesn't have it's own private path. No extra space, has a notch on the pad, refer to dimensions
